name: My Holiday
description: 画风清奇的RPG作品，故事讲述的是一个小学3年僧，随父母回老家的5天假期生活。在老家的小区你会遇到一群性格各异的小盆宇，展开一张并不是很激烈的假期冒险。
minimum_requirements: OS: micrsoft 64bit Window7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: micrsoft 64bit Window7.8.10 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
